name: tg-files-extractor
description: Utility to extract files and directories from a text file with specific delimiters

scripts.release:minor: npm run bump:minor && npm run tag && npm run github-release
scripts.release:patch: npm run bump:patch && npm run tag && npm run github-release
scripts.release:major: npm run bump:major && npm run tag && npm run github-release
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch -m 'Bump patch version to %s'
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor -m 'Bump minor version to %s'
scripts.bump:major: npm version major -m 'Bump major version to %s'
